tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_churn (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    last_activity TIMESTAMP,
    engagement_score INT,
    email_notifications BOOLEAN,
    subscription_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    last_activity TIMESTAMP,
    churn_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_interaction (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_result VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    account_created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type TEXT,
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    activity_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    session_start TIMESTAMP,
    session_end TIMESTAMP,
    session_duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE churn_prediction (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    churn_probability FLOAT,
    prediction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  join_date DATE,
  last_activity TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  activity_type TEXT,
  activity_description TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user_logs_user_id
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES users (user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE churn_prediction (
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  prediction_date DATE,
  predicted_churn_date DATE,
  accuracy DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_churn_prediction_user_id
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES users (user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE inactivity_alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  alert_date DATE,
  alert_message TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_inactivity_alerts_user_id
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES users (user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE engagement_patterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  pattern_date DATE,
  pattern_type TEXT,
  pattern_frequency INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_engagement_patterns_user_id
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES users (user_id)
)
